antimage_mana_break.name: Mana Break
antimage_mana_break.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
antimage_mana_break.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.

antimage_blink.name: Blink
antimage_blink.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
antimage_blink.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

antimage_counterspell.name: Counterspell
antimage_counterspell.description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
antimage_counterspell.lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

antimage_mana_overload.name: Blink Fragment
antimage_mana_overload.description: Blinks an illusion to the target enemy or location, which attacks for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.

antimage_mana_void.name: Mana Void
antimage_mana_void.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
antimage_mana_void.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

axe_berserkers_call.name: Berserker's Call
axe_berserkers_call.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
axe_berserkers_call.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

axe_battle_hunger.name: Battle Hunger
axe_battle_hunger.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
axe_battle_hunger.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.

axe_counter_helix.name: Counter Helix
axe_counter_helix.description: When attacked, Axe has a chance to perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
axe_counter_helix.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

axe_culling_blade.name: Culling Blade
axe_culling_blade.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
axe_culling_blade.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

special_bonus_unique_axe_8.description: +{s:bonus_speed_bonus}% Movement Speed per active Battle Hunger

special_bonus_unique_axe_3.description: +{s:bonus_armor_per_stack} Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack

bane_enfeeble.name: Enfeeble
bane_enfeeble.description: Lowers the enemy's total attack damage, cast range, and regeneration.
bane_enfeeble.lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

bane_brain_sap.name: Brain Sap
bane_brain_sap.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
bane_brain_sap.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

bane_nightmare.name: Nightmare
bane_nightmare.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely. Enemy Units take Pure Damage Per Second while in Nightmare.
bane_nightmare.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.

bane_fiends_grip.name: Fiend's Grip
bane_fiends_grip.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every %fiend_grip_tick_interval% seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
bane_fiends_grip.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

bloodseeker_bloodrage.name: Bloodrage
bloodseeker_bloodrage.description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
bloodseeker_bloodrage.lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

bloodseeker_blood_bath.name: Blood Rite
bloodseeker_blood_bath.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After %delay_plus_castpoint_tooltip% seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
bloodseeker_blood_bath.lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.

bloodseeker_thirst.name: Thirst
bloodseeker_thirst.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below %min_bonus_pct%%%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below %invis_threshold_pct%%%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
bloodseeker_thirst.lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

bloodseeker_blood_mist.name: Blood Mist
bloodseeker_blood_mist.description: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, damaging himself to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown.

bloodseeker_rupture.name: Rupture
bloodseeker_rupture.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.
bloodseeker_rupture.lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.name: Crystal Nova
crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
crystal_maiden_crystal_nova.lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

crystal_maiden_frostbite.name: Frostbite
crystal_maiden_frostbite.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts %creep_duration% seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
crystal_maiden_frostbite.lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.name: Arcane Aura
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a %proximity_bonus_radius% radius of Crystal Maiden receive %proximity_bonus_factor%x the mana regeneration. Crystal Maiden herself receives %self_factor%x the bonus.
crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura.lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

crystal_maiden_freezing_field.name: Freezing Field
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
crystal_maiden_freezing_field.lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

drow_ranger_frost_arrows.name: Frost Arrows
drow_ranger_frost_arrows.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
drow_ranger_frost_arrows.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.

drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.name: Gust
drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow. Drow Gains Movement Speed for the same duration.
drow_ranger_wave_of_silence.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

drow_ranger_multishot.name: Multishot
drow_ranger_multishot.description: Channeling. Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to %abilitychanneltime% seconds.
drow_ranger_multishot.lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.

drow_ranger_marksmanship.name: Marksmanship
drow_ranger_marksmanship.description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within %disable_range% range.
drow_ranger_marksmanship.lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.

earthshaker_fissure.name: Fissure
earthshaker_fissure.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
earthshaker_fissure.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.

earthshaker_enchant_totem.name: Enchant Totem
earthshaker_enchant_totem.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have %bonus_attack_range% bonus attack range on the next attack.
earthshaker_enchant_totem.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.

earthshaker_aftershock.name: Aftershock
earthshaker_aftershock.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
earthshaker_aftershock.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.

earthshaker_echo_slam.name: Echo Slam
earthshaker_echo_slam.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
earthshaker_echo_slam.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

juggernaut_blade_fury.name: Blade Fury
juggernaut_blade_fury.description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
juggernaut_blade_fury.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.

juggernaut_healing_ward.name: Healing Ward
juggernaut_healing_ward.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at %healing_ward_movespeed_tooltip% movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
juggernaut_healing_ward.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.

juggernaut_blade_dance.name: Blade Dance
juggernaut_blade_dance.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
juggernaut_blade_dance.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

juggernaut_swift_slash.name: Swiftslash
juggernaut_swift_slash.description: Performs a short Omnislash for %duration% seconds.

juggernaut_omni_slash.name: Omnislash
juggernaut_omni_slash.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
juggernaut_omni_slash.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'

mirana_starfall.name: Starstorm
mirana_starfall.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a %starfall_secondary_radius% radius will be struck a second time for %secondary_starfall_damage_percent%%% of the damage.
mirana_starfall.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.

mirana_arrow.name: Sacred Arrow
mirana_arrow.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from %arrow_min_stun% to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
mirana_arrow.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.

mirana_leap.name: Leap
mirana_leap.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts %leap_bonus_duration% seconds.
mirana_leap.lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.

mirana_invis.name: Moonlight Shadow
mirana_invis.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
mirana_invis.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.

nevermore_shadowraze1.name: Shadowraze
nevermore_shadowraze1.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases turn rate and movement speed.

nevermore_shadowraze2.name: Shadowraze
nevermore_shadowraze2.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases turn rate and movement speed.

nevermore_shadowraze3.name: Shadowraze
nevermore_shadowraze3.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases turn rate and movement speed.

nevermore_necromastery.name: Necromastery
nevermore_necromastery.description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.
nevermore_necromastery.lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.

nevermore_dark_lord.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
nevermore_dark_lord.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
nevermore_dark_lord.lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.

nevermore_requiem.name: Requiem of Souls
nevermore_requiem.description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for %requiem_slow_duration% seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of %requiem_slow_duration_max%. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
nevermore_requiem.lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.

morphling_waveform.name: Waveform
morphling_waveform.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
morphling_waveform.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

morphling_adaptive_strike_agi.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
morphling_adaptive_strike_agi.description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a %shared_cooldown% second cooldown.
morphling_adaptive_strike_agi.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

morphling_adaptive_strike_str.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
morphling_adaptive_strike_str.description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. 

 Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a %shared_cooldown% second cooldown.
morphling_adaptive_strike_str.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

morphling_morph_agi.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
morphling_morph_agi.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.
morphling_morph_agi.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

morphling_morph_str.name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
morphling_morph_str.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.
morphling_morph_str.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

morphling_replicate.name: Morph
morphling_replicate.description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
morphling_replicate.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.

morphling_morph_replicate.name: Morph Replicate
morphling_morph_replicate.description: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.

phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.name: Spirit Lance
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
phantom_lancer_spirit_lance.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.

phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.name: Doppelganger
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.description:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After %delay% second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes %illusion_2_damage_in_pct%%% bonus damage and deals %illusion_2_damage_out_pct%%% less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
phantom_lancer_doppelwalk.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.

phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.name: Phantom Rush
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
phantom_lancer_phantom_edge.lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.

phantom_lancer_juxtapose.name: Juxtapose
phantom_lancer_juxtapose.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for %illusion_duration% seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last %illusion_from_illusion_duration% seconds.
phantom_lancer_juxtapose.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...

puck_illusory_orb.name: Illusory Orb
puck_illusory_orb.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
puck_illusory_orb.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.

puck_waning_rift.name: Waning Rift
puck_waning_rift.description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
puck_waning_rift.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.

puck_phase_shift.name: Phase Shift
puck_phase_shift.description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
puck_phase_shift.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.

puck_ethereal_jaunt.name: Ethereal Jaunt
puck_ethereal_jaunt.description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

puck_dream_coil.name: Dream Coil
puck_dream_coil.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
puck_dream_coil.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.

pudge_meat_hook.name: Meat Hook
pudge_meat_hook.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
pudge_meat_hook.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.

pudge_rot.name: Rot
pudge_rot.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
pudge_rot.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.

pudge_flesh_heap.name: Flesh Heap
pudge_flesh_heap.description: Gives Pudge a guaranteed damage block against all types of attack. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
pudge_flesh_heap.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

pudge_eject.name: Eject
pudge_eject.description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.

pudge_dismember.name: Dismember
pudge_dismember.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts longer on creeps.
pudge_dismember.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'

special_bonus_unique_pudge_1.description: {s:bonus_flesh_heap_strength_buff_amount}x Flesh Heap Stack Str and Damage Block bonuses

razor_plasma_field.name: Plasma Field
razor_plasma_field.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
razor_plasma_field.lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

razor_static_link.name: Static Link
razor_static_link.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
razor_static_link.lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.

razor_unstable_current.name: Storm Surge
razor_unstable_current.lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

razor_eye_of_the_storm.name: Eye of the Storm
razor_eye_of_the_storm.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

special_bonus_unique_razor_2.description: -0.1s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval

special_bonus_unique_razor_plasmafield_s.description: Creates A Second Plasma Field Delayed By {s:bonus_second_ring_delay}s

sandking_burrowstrike.name: Burrowstrike
sandking_burrowstrike.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
sandking_burrowstrike.lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

sandking_sand_storm.name: Sand Storm
sandking_sand_storm.description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
sandking_sand_storm.lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.

sandking_caustic_finale.name: Caustic Finale
sandking_caustic_finale.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.
sandking_caustic_finale.lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

sandking_epicenter.name: Epicenter
sandking_epicenter.description: After a cast point of %abilitycastpoint% seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
sandking_epicenter.lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.

storm_spirit_static_remnant.name: Static Remnant
storm_spirit_static_remnant.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts %abilityduration% seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
storm_spirit_static_remnant.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.

storm_spirit_electric_vortex.name: Electric Vortex
storm_spirit_electric_vortex.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
storm_spirit_electric_vortex.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.

storm_spirit_overload.name: Overload
storm_spirit_overload.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

storm_spirit_ball_lightning.name: Ball Lightning
storm_spirit_ball_lightning.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is %ball_lightning_initial_mana_base%+%ball_lightning_initial_mana_percentage%%% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is %ball_lightning_travel_cost_base%+%ball_lightning_travel_cost_percent%%% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

special_bonus_unique_storm_spirit_4.description: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning

sven_storm_bolt.name: Storm Hammer
sven_storm_bolt.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
sven_storm_bolt.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.

sven_great_cleave.name: Great Cleave
sven_great_cleave.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
sven_great_cleave.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

sven_warcry.name: Warcry
sven_warcry.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts %duration% seconds.
sven_warcry.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!

sven_gods_strength.name: God's Strength
sven_gods_strength.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for %abilityduration% seconds.
sven_gods_strength.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.

tiny_avalanche.name: Avalanche
tiny_avalanche.description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does %toss_multiplier%x damage to units being tossed.
tiny_avalanche.lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

tiny_toss.name: Toss
tiny_toss.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a %grab_radius% radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
tiny_toss.lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.

tiny_tree_grab.name: Tree Grab
tiny_tree_grab.description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.

tiny_tree_channel.name: Tree Volley
tiny_tree_channel.description: Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
tiny_tree_channel.lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

tiny_grow.name: Grow
tiny_grow.description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
tiny_grow.lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

tiny_toss_tree.name: Tree Throw
tiny_toss_tree.description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
tiny_toss_tree.lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.

vengefulspirit_magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
vengefulspirit_magic_missile.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
vengefulspirit_magic_missile.lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.

vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.name: Wave of Terror
vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.
vengefulspirit_wave_of_terror.lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

vengefulspirit_command_aura.name: Vengeance Aura
vengefulspirit_command_aura.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
vengefulspirit_command_aura.lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.

vengefulspirit_nether_swap.name: Nether Swap
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take %damage% damage, Allied swapped units receive less damage for a short duration.
vengefulspirit_nether_swap.lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.

windrunner_shackleshot.name: Shackleshot
windrunner_shackleshot.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to %fail_stun_duration%.
windrunner_shackleshot.lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.

windrunner_powershot.name: Powershot
windrunner_powershot.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to %abilitychanneltime% second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced.
windrunner_powershot.lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.

windrunner_windrun.name: Windrun
windrunner_windrun.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
windrunner_windrun.lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.

windrunner_gale_force.name: Gale Force
windrunner_gale_force.description: Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction. Vector Targeted.
windrunner_gale_force.lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

windrunner_focusfire.name: Focus Fire
windrunner_focusfire.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain %bonus_attack_speed% additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
windrunner_focusfire.lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.

special_bonus_unique_windranger_2.description: Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 20s.

zuus_arc_lightning.name: Arc Lightning
zuus_arc_lightning.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
zuus_arc_lightning.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

zuus_lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
zuus_lightning_bolt.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a %sight_radius_night% radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in %spread_aoe% range.
zuus_lightning_bolt.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.

zuus_heavenly_jump.name: Heavenly Jump
zuus_heavenly_jump.description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage, reducing their movement, attack speed and increasing their cast time. If Zeus was moving forward, he will jump towards that direction. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

zuus_cloud.name: Nimbus
zuus_cloud.description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

zuus_static_field.name: Static Field
zuus_static_field.description: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to %damage_health_pct%%% of their current health.
zuus_static_field.lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.

zuus_thundergods_wrath.name: Thundergod's Wrath
zuus_thundergods_wrath.description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
zuus_thundergods_wrath.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

kunkka_torrent.name: Torrent
kunkka_torrent.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
kunkka_torrent.lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.

kunkka_tidebringer.name: Tidebringer
kunkka_tidebringer.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
kunkka_tidebringer.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.name: X Marks the Spot
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
kunkka_x_marks_the_spot.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.

kunkka_torrent_storm.name: Torrent Storm
kunkka_torrent_storm.description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around Kunkka once every %torrent_interval% for %torrent_duration% seconds. Spawns within %torrent_max_distance% range of him.
kunkka_torrent_storm.lore: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.

kunkka_tidal_wave.name: Tidal Wave
kunkka_tidal_wave.description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

kunkka_ghostship.name: Ghostship
kunkka_ghostship.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
kunkka_ghostship.lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.

kunkka_return.name: Return
kunkka_return.description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

special_bonus_unique_kunkka_6.description: +{s:bonus_ally_ms}% X Mark the Spot Move Speed

lina_dragon_slave.name: Dragon Slave
lina_dragon_slave.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
lina_dragon_slave.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.

lina_light_strike_array.name: Light Strike Array
lina_light_strike_array.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
lina_light_strike_array.lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.

lina_fiery_soul.name: Fiery Soul
lina_fiery_soul.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts %fiery_soul_stack_duration% seconds.
lina_fiery_soul.lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.

lina_flame_cloak.name: Flame Cloak
lina_flame_cloak.description: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance
lina_flame_cloak.lore: A natural defense equally suited to keeping anything from unwanted sisters to snarling hellbeasts at bay.

lina_laguna_blade.name: Laguna Blade
lina_laguna_blade.description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
lina_laguna_blade.lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.

special_bonus_unique_lina_7.description: Laguna Blade damage is Pure and pierces Spell Immunity

lich_frost_nova.name: Frost Blast
lich_frost_nova.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for %abilityduration% seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage and extra attack speed slow.
lich_frost_nova.lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

lich_frost_shield.name: Frost Shield
lich_frost_shield.description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every %interval% seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
lich_frost_shield.lore: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.

lich_sinister_gaze.name: Sinister Gaze
lich_sinister_gaze.description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana.

lich_ice_spire.name: Ice Spire
lich_ice_spire.description:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 5 hero hits or 10 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can bounce to the Spire if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.

lich_chain_frost.name: Chain Frost
lich_chain_frost.description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to %jumps% times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.
lich_chain_frost.lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.

lion_impale.name: Earth Spike
lion_impale.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
lion_impale.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.

lion_voodoo.name: Hex
lion_voodoo.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
lion_voodoo.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.

lion_mana_drain.name: Mana Drain
lion_mana_drain.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
lion_mana_drain.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.

lion_finger_of_death.name: Finger of Death
lion_finger_of_death.description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
lion_finger_of_death.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.

special_bonus_unique_lion_11.description: +70 Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill

special_bonus_unique_lion_8.description: +{s:bonus_damage_per_kill} Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

shadow_shaman_ether_shock.name: Ether Shock
shadow_shaman_ether_shock.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
shadow_shaman_ether_shock.lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.

shadow_shaman_voodoo.name: Hex
shadow_shaman_voodoo.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.
shadow_shaman_voodoo.lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.

shadow_shaman_shackles.name: Shackles
shadow_shaman_shackles.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
shadow_shaman_shackles.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.

shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.name: Mass Serpent Ward
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.description: Summons %ward_count% Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
shadow_shaman_mass_serpent_ward.lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.

slardar_sprint.name: Guardian Sprint
slardar_sprint.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration and armor while in a puddle or river.
slardar_sprint.lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.

slardar_slithereen_crush.name: Slithereen Crush
slardar_slithereen_crush.description: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
slardar_slithereen_crush.lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.

slardar_bash.name: Bash of the Deep
slardar_bash.description: After %attack_count% attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps.
slardar_bash.lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.

slardar_amplify_damage.name: Corrosive Haze
slardar_amplify_damage.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.
slardar_amplify_damage.lore: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.

tidehunter_gush.name: Gush
tidehunter_gush.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
tidehunter_gush.lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.

tidehunter_kraken_shell.name: Kraken Shell
tidehunter_kraken_shell.description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
tidehunter_kraken_shell.lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.

tidehunter_anchor_smash.name: Anchor Smash
tidehunter_anchor_smash.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
tidehunter_anchor_smash.lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.

tidehunter_arm_of_the_deep.name: Tendrils of the Deep
tidehunter_arm_of_the_deep.description: Tidehunter unleashes a targeted slew of tentacles that damage and stun enemies within reach. The tentacles deal %damage_pct%%% of Ravage's damage and stun, with a range %range_pct%%% of Ravage's radius.

tidehunter_ravage.name: Ravage
tidehunter_ravage.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
tidehunter_ravage.lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.

special_bonus_unique_tidehunter_8.description: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.name: Paralyzing Cask
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals %creep_damage_pct%%% damage to creeps.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.

witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.name: Voodoo Restoration
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units and damaging enemies for %enemy_damage_pct%%% of the heal value, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.

witch_doctor_maledict.name: Maledict
witch_doctor_maledict.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
witch_doctor_maledict.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.

witch_doctor_voodoo_switcheroo.name: Voodoo Switcheroo
witch_doctor_voodoo_switcheroo.description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

witch_doctor_death_ward.name: Death Ward
witch_doctor_death_ward.description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of %abilitychanneltime% seconds. Death Ward has %bonus_accuracy%%% bonus accuracy.
witch_doctor_death_ward.lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.

riki_smoke_screen.name: Smoke Screen
riki_smoke_screen.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.
riki_smoke_screen.lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.

riki_blink_strike.name: Blink Strike
riki_blink_strike.description: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
riki_blink_strike.lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.

riki_tricks_of_the_trade.name: Tricks of the Trade
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.description: Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.
riki_tricks_of_the_trade.lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.

riki_poison_dart.name: Sleeping Dart
riki_poison_dart.description: Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep.  The target will wake up at the end of the duration or if they take too much damage. Upon waking up, the target takes damage and is slowed.

riki_backstab.name: Cloak and Dagger
riki_backstab.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. Bonus damage is doubled against non-hero units. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

special_bonus_unique_riki_5.description: Tricks of the Trade Applies a Basic Dispel

enigma_malefice.name: Malefice
enigma_malefice.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every %tick_rate% seconds.
enigma_malefice.lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.

enigma_demonic_conversion.name: Demonic Conversion
enigma_demonic_conversion.description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
enigma_demonic_conversion.lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.

enigma_midnight_pulse.name: Midnight Pulse
enigma_midnight_pulse.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their current HP.
enigma_midnight_pulse.lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.

enigma_black_hole.name: Black Hole
enigma_black_hole.description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
enigma_black_hole.lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

tinker_laser.name: Laser
tinker_laser.description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
tinker_laser.lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

tinker_heat_seeking_missile.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
tinker_heat_seeking_missile.description: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within %radius% range.
tinker_heat_seeking_missile.lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.

tinker_defense_matrix.name: Defense Matrix
tinker_defense_matrix.description: Targets an allied unit, applying a barrier to them that blocks some damage and provides Status Resistance.

tinker_warp_grenade.name: Warp Flare
tinker_warp_grenade.description: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for %debuff_duration% seconds.

tinker_keen_teleport.name: Keen Conveyance
tinker_keen_teleport.description: After channeling for %abilitychanneltime%s teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
tinker_keen_teleport.lore: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'

tinker_rearm.name: Rearm
tinker_rearm.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
tinker_rearm.lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.

sniper_shrapnel.name: Shrapnel
sniper_shrapnel.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every %abilitychargerestoretime% seconds.
sniper_shrapnel.lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.

sniper_headshot.name: Headshot
sniper_headshot.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Headshots  briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed slowed by %slow%%%.
sniper_headshot.lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.

sniper_take_aim.name: Take Aim
sniper_take_aim.description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provide %headshot_chance%%% Headshot chance for 3 seconds. Slows you by %slow%%% for the duration.
sniper_take_aim.lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

sniper_concussive_grenade.name: Concussive Grenade
sniper_concussive_grenade.description: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.

sniper_assassinate.name: Assassinate
sniper_assassinate.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.
sniper_assassinate.lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.

necrolyte_death_pulse.name: Death Pulse
necrolyte_death_pulse.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
necrolyte_death_pulse.lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.

necrolyte_sadist.name: Ghost Shroud
necrolyte_sadist.description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
necrolyte_sadist.lore: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.

necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.name: Heartstopper Aura
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for %regen_duration% seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.
necrolyte_heartstopper_aura.lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.

necrolyte_death_seeker.name: Death Seeker
necrolyte_death_seeker.description: Spawns a fast moving large Death Pulse towards the target enemy or ally, causing the target to become ethereal. Reduces enemy magic resistance. Spreads towards nearby enemies and allies after impact.

necrolyte_reapers_scythe.name: Reaper's Scythe
necrolyte_reapers_scythe.description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.
necrolyte_reapers_scythe.lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.

warlock_fatal_bonds.name: Fatal Bonds
warlock_fatal_bonds.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
warlock_fatal_bonds.lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.

warlock_shadow_word.name: Shadow Word
warlock_shadow_word.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
warlock_shadow_word.lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.

warlock_upheaval.name: Upheaval
warlock_upheaval.description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to %abilitychanneltime% seconds. Enemies are slowed for %duration% seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.
warlock_upheaval.lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.

warlock_rain_of_chaos.name: Chaotic Offering
warlock_rain_of_chaos.description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives %golem_duration% seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
warlock_rain_of_chaos.lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.

special_bonus_unique_warlock_10.description: +12 Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies

special_bonus_unique_warlock_1.description: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems

beastmaster_wild_axes.name: Wild Axes
beastmaster_wild_axes.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
beastmaster_wild_axes.lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.

beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar.name: Call of the Wild Boar
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar.description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_boar.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk.description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.
beastmaster_call_of_the_wild_hawk.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

beastmaster_inner_beast.name: Inner Beast
beastmaster_inner_beast.description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.
beastmaster_inner_beast.lore: Beastmaster's ability to incite the innate strength of animals was seen in the mauling of the king of Slom.

beastmaster_drums_of_slom.name: Drums of Slom
beastmaster_drums_of_slom.description: Beastmaster beats his drums with ever-increasing speed. Each strike deals damage to enemies around him, healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of damage dealt. Beastmaster cannot strike his drums if he is silenced or stunned.
beastmaster_drums_of_slom.lore: Nature's rage is timeless, and for those who know the secrets, it's easy to stir the echoes of ire that rejoiced in the downfall of Slom.

beastmaster_primal_roar.name: Primal Roar
beastmaster_primal_roar.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain %movement_speed%%% movement speed for 3 seconds.
beastmaster_primal_roar.lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.

special_bonus_unique_beastmaster_9.description: +{s:bonus_damage_amp}% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack

queenofpain_shadow_strike.name: Shadow Strike
queenofpain_shadow_strike.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for %duration% seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every %damage_interval% seconds. Queen of Pain relishes in the pain inflicted, healing every time the enemy takes damage. Creeps heal for half the damage only.
queenofpain_shadow_strike.lore: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.

queenofpain_blink.name: Blink
queenofpain_blink.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
queenofpain_blink.lore: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.

queenofpain_scream_of_pain.name: Scream Of Pain
queenofpain_scream_of_pain.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
queenofpain_scream_of_pain.lore: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.

queenofpain_sonic_wave.name: Sonic Wave
queenofpain_sonic_wave.description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.
queenofpain_sonic_wave.lore: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.

venomancer_venomous_gale.name: Venomous Gale
venomancer_venomous_gale.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
venomancer_venomous_gale.lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.

venomancer_poison_sting.name: Poison Sting
venomancer_poison_sting.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.
venomancer_poison_sting.lore: The paralytic sting of the creature which caused his transformation now belongs to the Venomancer.

venomancer_plague_ward.name: Plague Ward
venomancer_plague_ward.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
venomancer_plague_ward.lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.

venomancer_latent_poison.name: Latent Toxicity
venomancer_latent_poison.description: Applies a weak poison that minorly slows and deals damage to its target. If this poison is dispelled in any way, the target will receive a large amount of damage and be stunned.
venomancer_latent_poison.lore: As Venomancer's own origins corroborate, some of Jidi's most horrifying dangers become apparent only with time.

venomancer_poison_nova.name: Poison Nova
venomancer_poison_nova.description: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.
venomancer_poison_nova.lore: In the Acid Jungles, creatures releasing noxious poison to their attackers is common; Venomancer spreads this plague beyond the Jidi Isle.

faceless_void_time_walk.name: Time Walk
faceless_void_time_walk.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last %backtrack_duration% seconds.
faceless_void_time_walk.lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.

faceless_void_time_dilation.name: Time Dilation
faceless_void_time_dilation.description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for %duration% seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by %slow%%% for each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown.

faceless_void_time_lock.name: Time Lock
faceless_void_time_lock.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.
faceless_void_time_lock.lore: The strike of the Faceless Void lands with dimension shifting force.

faceless_void_time_walk_reverse.name: Reverse Time Walk
faceless_void_time_walk_reverse.description: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

faceless_void_chronosphere.name: Chronosphere
faceless_void_chronosphere.description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
faceless_void_chronosphere.lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.

skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.name: Wraithfire Blast
skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
skeleton_king_hellfire_blast.lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.name: Vampiric Spirit
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.description: Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.
skeleton_king_vampiric_aura.lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.

skeleton_king_mortal_strike.name: Mortal Strike
skeleton_king_mortal_strike.description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
skeleton_king_mortal_strike.lore: One blow to crush a foe.

skeleton_king_reincarnation.name: Reincarnation
skeleton_king_reincarnation.description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a %slow_radius% radius will be slowed.
skeleton_king_reincarnation.lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.

death_prophet_carrion_swarm.name: Crypt Swarm
death_prophet_carrion_swarm.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
death_prophet_carrion_swarm.lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.

death_prophet_silence.name: Silence
death_prophet_silence.description: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
death_prophet_silence.lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.

death_prophet_spirit_siphon.name: Spirit Siphon
death_prophet_spirit_siphon.description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.

death_prophet_exorcism.name: Exorcism
death_prophet_exorcism.description:
Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
Passively grants Movement Speed.
death_prophet_exorcism.lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.

phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.name: Stifling Dagger
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing %base_damage%+%attack_factor_tooltip%%% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.
phantom_assassin_stifling_dagger.lore: The first skill learned by the Sisters of the Veil often signals an incoming hit.

phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.name: Phantom Strike
phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed and lifesteal while attacking if it's an enemy unit.
phantom_assassin_phantom_strike.lore: Mortred's silken veil is the last thing her unfortunate target sees.

phantom_assassin_blur.name: Blur
phantom_assassin_blur.description:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
phantom_assassin_blur.lore: Meditation allows a Veiled Sister to carefully anticipate her opponents in combat.

phantom_assassin_fan_of_knives.name: Fan of Knives
phantom_assassin_fan_of_knives.description: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.

phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.name: Coup de Grace
phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.
phantom_assassin_coup_de_grace.lore: A divine strike, Mortred honors her opponent by choosing them for death.

pugna_nether_blast.name: Nether Blast
pugna_nether_blast.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
pugna_nether_blast.lore: The Arts of Oblivion include a deafening blast of emerald flames from the Nether Reaches.

pugna_decrepify.name: Decrepify
pugna_decrepify.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage. Can be cast while channeling.
pugna_decrepify.lore: A now-mastered relic from his childhood, Pugna delights in banishing others into the Nether Realm, whether for good, evil, or simple enjoyment.

pugna_nether_ward.name: Nether Ward
pugna_nether_ward.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.
pugna_nether_ward.lore: While at the lamasery for the Arts of Oblivion, Pugna learned to dominate his classmates with a simple ward charged with Nether magic.

pugna_life_drain.name: Life Drain
pugna_life_drain.description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.
pugna_life_drain.lore: Pugna has truly become more powerful than even the grandmaster of Oblivion.

templar_assassin_refraction.name: Refraction
templar_assassin_refraction.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.
templar_assassin_refraction.lore: Manipulating her psionic veil, Lanaya bends nature's law to her will.

templar_assassin_meld.name: Meld
templar_assassin_meld.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for %abilityduration% seconds.
templar_assassin_meld.lore: Lanaya is as elusive as her covenant with the Hidden Temple.

templar_assassin_psi_blades.name: Psi Blades
templar_assassin_psi_blades.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.
templar_assassin_psi_blades.lore: Her blades pierce the skin as much as the mind, furthering her understanding of the mystery that is reality.

templar_assassin_trap.name: Trap
templar_assassin_trap.description: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

templar_assassin_trap_teleport.name: Psionic Projection
templar_assassin_trap_teleport.description: Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for %abilitychanneltime% seconds, detonating it upon arrival. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
templar_assassin_trap_teleport.lore: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.

templar_assassin_psionic_trap.name: Psionic Trap
templar_assassin_psionic_trap.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of %movement_speed_min%%% in the area. Traps charge up to slow %movement_speed_max%%% after %trap_max_charge_duration% seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
templar_assassin_psionic_trap.lore: Calling upon the reach of the Hidden Temple, none escape the eye of the Templar.

special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_re.description: Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled

special_bonus_unique_templar_assassin_8.description: +120 Psi Blades Attack and Spill Range

viper_poison_attack.name: Poison Attack
viper_poison_attack.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to %max_stacks% times.
viper_poison_attack.lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.

viper_nethertoxin.name: Nethertoxin
viper_nethertoxin.description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.
viper_nethertoxin.lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.

viper_corrosive_skin.name: Corrosive Skin
viper_corrosive_skin.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a %max_range_tooltip% radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
viper_corrosive_skin.lore: It is not unusual for sword and shield alike to corrode in the very hands of those who attack the Netherdrake.

viper_nose_dive.name: Nosedive
viper_nose_dive.description: Viper slams into the ground, disarming each enemy in a %radius% AoE for %effect_duration% seconds and splattering everyone in a %corrosive_radius% AoE with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
viper_nose_dive.lore: It was thought that Netherdrake wings touch ground only in death, but some surmise that those who've witnessed more intentional landings merely haven't survived to tell the tale.

viper_viper_strike.name: Viper Strike
viper_viper_strike.description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
viper_viper_strike.lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.

luna_lucent_beam.name: Lucent Beam
luna_lucent_beam.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.
luna_lucent_beam.lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.

luna_moon_glaive.name: Moon Glaives
luna_moon_glaive.description: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.
luna_moon_glaive.lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.

luna_lunar_blessing.name: Lunar Blessing
luna_lunar_blessing.description: Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied heroes. At night Lunar Blessing is global, and Luna is blessed with increased vision range.
luna_lunar_blessing.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

luna_eclipse.name: Eclipse
luna_eclipse.description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for a short time.
luna_eclipse.lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.

special_bonus_unique_luna_8.description: {s:bonus_glaives_fired} Moon Glaives fired on Lucent Beam

dragon_knight_breathe_fire.name: Breathe Fire
dragon_knight_breathe_fire.description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
dragon_knight_breathe_fire.lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.

dragon_knight_dragon_tail.name: Dragon Tail
dragon_knight_dragon_tail.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to %dragon_cast_range%.
dragon_knight_dragon_tail.lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.

dragon_knight_dragon_blood.name: Dragon Blood
