dragon_knight_dragon_blood.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
dragon_knight_dragon_blood.lore: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.

dragon_knight_fireball.name: Fireball
dragon_knight_fireball.description: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.name: Elder Dragon Form
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.description:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.
<font color="#9acd32">LEVEL 1 Green Dragon</font> - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal %corrosive_breath_damage% poison damage per second for %corrosive_breath_duration% seconds. Works on structures.
<font color="#ff0000">LEVEL 2 Red Dragon</font> - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a %splash_radius% radius for %splash_damage_percent%%% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
<font color="#87ceeb">LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon</font> - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by %frost_bonus_movement_speed%%% and attack speed by %frost_bonus_attack_speed% of enemy units in Splash Attack range for %frost_duration% seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form.lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.

special_bonus_unique_dragon_knight_9.description: +{s:bonus_dragon_form_bonus_pct}% Breathe Fire Damage/Cast Range in Dragon Form

special_bonus_unique_dragon_knight_8.description: +400 AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form

dazzle_poison_touch.name: Poison Touch
dazzle_poison_touch.description: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.
dazzle_poison_touch.lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.

dazzle_shallow_grave.name: Shallow Grave
dazzle_shallow_grave.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.
dazzle_shallow_grave.lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.

dazzle_shadow_wave.name: Shadow Wave
dazzle_shadow_wave.description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
dazzle_shadow_wave.lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.

dazzle_good_juju.name: Good Juju
dazzle_good_juju.description: Whenever Dazzle Casts a Spell, all other abilities currently on cooldown have their cooldowns reduced.
dazzle_good_juju.lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.

dazzle_bad_juju.name: Bad Juju
dazzle_bad_juju.description:
Whenever a Unit is affected by Dazzle's spells they temporarily gain/lose armor.
  Can be activated to heal/deal damage to units based on the amount of charges they have.
dazzle_bad_juju.lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.

rattletrap_battery_assault.name: Battery Assault
rattletrap_battery_assault.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun. Deals double damage to creeps.
rattletrap_battery_assault.lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.

rattletrap_power_cogs.name: Power Cogs
rattletrap_power_cogs.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
rattletrap_power_cogs.lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.

rattletrap_rocket_flare.name: Rocket Flare
rattletrap_rocket_flare.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for %duration% seconds.
rattletrap_rocket_flare.lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.

rattletrap_overclocking.name: Overclocking
rattletrap_overclocking.description: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in it's range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.
rattletrap_overclocking.lore: Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.

rattletrap_jetpack.name: Jetpack
rattletrap_jetpack.description: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.

rattletrap_hookshot.name: Hookshot
rattletrap_hookshot.description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage to everyone in a %stun_radius% radius around the hit target.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
rattletrap_hookshot.lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.

leshrac_split_earth.name: Split Earth
leshrac_split_earth.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
leshrac_split_earth.lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.

leshrac_diabolic_edict.name: Diabolic Edict
leshrac_diabolic_edict.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
leshrac_diabolic_edict.lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.

leshrac_lightning_storm.name: Lightning Storm
leshrac_lightning_storm.description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.
leshrac_lightning_storm.lore: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.

leshrac_greater_lightning_storm.name: Nihilism
leshrac_greater_lightning_storm.description: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.

leshrac_pulse_nova.name: Pulse Nova
leshrac_pulse_nova.description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.
leshrac_pulse_nova.lore: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.

special_bonus_unique_leshrac_2.description: Lightning Storm Can Bounce Twice On Units

furion_sprout.name: Sprout
furion_sprout.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, and providing vision in a %vision_range% radius.
furion_sprout.lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.

furion_teleportation.name: Teleportation
furion_teleportation.description: Teleports to any point on the map.
furion_teleportation.lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.

furion_force_of_nature.name: Nature's Call
furion_force_of_nature.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
furion_force_of_nature.lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.

furion_curse_of_the_forest.name: Curse of the Oldgrowth
furion_curse_of_the_forest.description: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within %range% range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within %radius% radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.
furion_curse_of_the_forest.lore: Though powerful, Nature's Prophet's gifts do not include all-sight, and he must rely heavily upon reconnaissance and aid from a long-standing network of stalwart friends.

furion_wrath_of_nature.name: Wrath of Nature
furion_wrath_of_nature.description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Enemies that die under this spell grant you bonus damage for %kill_damage_duration% seconds.
furion_wrath_of_nature.lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.

life_stealer_rage.name: Rage
life_stealer_rage.description:
Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, and gaining increased movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
life_stealer_rage.lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.

life_stealer_feast.name: Feast
life_stealer_feast.description: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health.
life_stealer_feast.lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.

life_stealer_ghoul_frenzy.name: Ghoul Frenzy
life_stealer_ghoul_frenzy.description: Passively causes Lifestealer's attacks to significantly slow enemy movement speed for %duration% seconds. Grants you Attack Speed.

life_stealer_open_wounds.name: Open Wounds
life_stealer_open_wounds.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes. After receiving %damage_threshold% damage, the Open Wounds fester and spread to a non-infected random enemy within %spread_radius% radius.
life_stealer_open_wounds.lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.

life_stealer_infest.name: Infest
life_stealer_infest.description:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
life_stealer_infest.lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.

life_stealer_consume.name: Consume
life_stealer_consume.description: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.

dark_seer_vacuum.name: Vacuum
dark_seer_vacuum.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
dark_seer_vacuum.lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.

dark_seer_ion_shell.name: Ion Shell
dark_seer_ion_shell.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
dark_seer_ion_shell.lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.

dark_seer_surge.name: Surge
dark_seer_surge.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of movement speed and removes unit collisions. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.
dark_seer_surge.lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.

dark_seer_normal_punch.name: Normal Punch
dark_seer_normal_punch.description: Passive cooldown attack. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past %recent_duration% seconds. Max power is reached after %max_distance% distance moved.

dark_seer_wall_of_replica.name: Wall of Replica
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.
dark_seer_wall_of_replica.lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.

clinkz_strafe.name: Burning Barrage
clinkz_strafe.description: Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers.
clinkz_strafe.lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.

clinkz_searing_arrows.name: Searing Arrows
clinkz_searing_arrows.description: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.
clinkz_searing_arrows.lore: Clinkz simply lights his arrows from his flaming essence for quite the destructive effect.

clinkz_wind_walk.name: Skeleton Walk
clinkz_wind_walk.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items.
clinkz_wind_walk.lore: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.

clinkz_burning_army.name: Burning Army
clinkz_burning_army.description: Clinkz summons an army of fiery ranged skeleton archers. Archers are immobile and die with 2 attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage, use his current Searing Arrows ability and attack only heroes. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range.
clinkz_burning_army.lore: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.

clinkz_death_pact.name: Death Pact
clinkz_death_pact.description: Clinkz consumes the target enemy creep or friendly creep, gaining max health and damage based on its maximum health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.
clinkz_death_pact.lore: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.

omniknight_purification.name: Purification
omniknight_purification.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.
omniknight_purification.lore: Priests of the Omniscience are adept at removing impurities from fellow warriors.

omniknight_martyr.name: Heavenly Grace
omniknight_martyr.description: Applies a strong dispel on himself and the target ally and grants both of them bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs dispelled.
omniknight_martyr.lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.

omniknight_hammer_of_purity.name: Hammer of Purity
omniknight_hammer_of_purity.description: Omniknight fires his hammer to a target to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slows the target.

omniknight_degen_aura.name: Degen Aura
omniknight_degen_aura.description: Greatly degenerates the movement capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.
omniknight_degen_aura.lore: The holy embodiment of Purist Thunderwrath is enough to weaken those of lesser faith.

omniknight_guardian_angel.name: Guardian Angel
omniknight_guardian_angel.description: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants allies immunity from physical damage.
omniknight_guardian_angel.lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.

special_bonus_unique_omniknight_2.description: +3 Heavenly Grace Strength/HP Regen per Debuff

enchantress_impetus.name: Impetus
enchantress_impetus.description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.
enchantress_impetus.lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.

enchantress_enchant.name: Enchant
enchantress_enchant.description:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing its attack damage and max health. Only one creep can be controlled at a time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
enchantress_enchant.lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.

enchantress_natures_attendants.name: Nature's Attendants
enchantress_natures_attendants.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
enchantress_natures_attendants.lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.

enchantress_bunny_hop.name: Sproink
enchantress_bunny_hop.description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the %attack_targets% furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + %bonus_attack_range%.

enchantress_little_friends.name: Little Friends
enchantress_little_friends.description: All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack Enchantress' chosen target for %duration% seconds.

enchantress_untouchable.name: Untouchable
enchantress_untouchable.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
enchantress_untouchable.lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.

huskar_inner_fire.name: Inner Fire
huskar_inner_fire.description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.
huskar_inner_fire.lore: Not even Huskar's own flesh can contain the unending expansion of his life force.

huskar_burning_spear.name: Burning Spear
huskar_burning_spear.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.
huskar_burning_spear.lore: The Sacred Warrior ignites his weaponry after marking it with his own blood - causing far greater pain than he himself feels.

huskar_berserkers_blood.name: Berserker's Blood
huskar_berserkers_blood.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.
huskar_berserkers_blood.lore: After losing his birthright, Huskar gained a lethality in physical combat that is only heightened as his own blood is spilled.

huskar_life_break.name: Life Break
huskar_life_break.description:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
huskar_life_break.lore: No matter the danger, Huskar thrusts himself into melees that only he can survive.

night_stalker_void.name: Void
night_stalker_void.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and the slowing effect lasts longer.
night_stalker_void.lore: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.

night_stalker_crippling_fear.name: Crippling Fear
night_stalker_crippling_fear.description: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.
night_stalker_crippling_fear.lore: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.

night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night.name: Hunter in the Night
night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night.lore: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.

night_stalker_darkness.name: Dark Ascension
night_stalker_darkness.description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.
night_stalker_darkness.lore: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.

special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_hunte.description: +{s:bonus_bonus_status_resist_night}% Hunter in the Night Status Resistance

special_bonus_unique_night_stalker_2.description: +{s:bonus_bonus_attack_speed_night} Hunter In The Night Attack Speed

broodmother_insatiable_hunger.name: Insatiable Hunger
broodmother_insatiable_hunger.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
broodmother_insatiable_hunger.lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.

broodmother_spin_web.name: Spin Web
broodmother_spin_web.description: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, increases her Turn Rate, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement. Spin Web charges restore every %abilitychargerestoretime% seconds, with a max of %AbilityCharges% charges. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP
broodmother_spin_web.lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of foreboding.

broodmother_silken_bola.name: Silken Bola
broodmother_silken_bola.description: Slows the target enemy, causes them to miss and deals impact damage. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.

broodmother_sticky_snare.name: Spinner's Snare
broodmother_sticky_snare.lore: The slightest tremor of her web is all Arachnia needs to find her prey.

broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.name: Spawn Spiderlings
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.

bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.name: Shuriken Toss
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a %bounce_aoe% radius of each other.  Deals bonus damage to Tracked targets.
bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss.lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.

bounty_hunter_jinada.name: Jinada
bounty_hunter_jinada.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.
bounty_hunter_jinada.lore: Gondar's vast experience ensures he never walks away from a transaction empty-handed.

bounty_hunter_wind_walk.name: Shadow Walk
bounty_hunter_wind_walk.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will slow the target's movement speed.
bounty_hunter_wind_walk.lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.

bounty_hunter_track.name: Track
bounty_hunter_track.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit and deals critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.
bounty_hunter_track.lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.

special_bonus_unique_bounty_hunter_9.description: {s:bonus_silence_duration}s Silence on Hit With Shadow Walk

special_bonus_unique_bounty_hunter_6.description: Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies

weaver_the_swarm.name: The Swarm
weaver_the_swarm.description: Weaver launches a swarm of %count% young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
weaver_the_swarm.lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.

weaver_shukuchi.name: Shukuchi
weaver_shukuchi.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
weaver_shukuchi.lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.

weaver_geminate_attack.name: Geminate Attack
weaver_geminate_attack.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
weaver_geminate_attack.lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.

weaver_time_lapse.name: Time Lapse
weaver_time_lapse.description:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
weaver_time_lapse.lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.

jakiro_dual_breath.name: Dual Breath
jakiro_dual_breath.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
jakiro_dual_breath.lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.

jakiro_ice_path.name: Ice Path
jakiro_ice_path.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
jakiro_ice_path.lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.

jakiro_liquid_fire.name: Liquid Fire
jakiro_liquid_fire.description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks. Deals 75% damage to buildings.
jakiro_liquid_fire.lore: The left maw of Jakiro opens, laying waste to any in its path.

jakiro_liquid_ice.name: Liquid Frost
jakiro_liquid_ice.description: Jakiro adds a frost effect to his attack, stunning enemies. Enemies hit are slowed and receive a percent their max health per second plus a base amount as damage every %tick_rate% second for %duration% seconds.

jakiro_macropyre.name: Macropyre
jakiro_macropyre.description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
jakiro_macropyre.lore: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.

batrider_sticky_napalm.name: Sticky Napalm
batrider_sticky_napalm.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to %max_stacks% stacks. Applies a small amount of damage with each cast.
batrider_sticky_napalm.lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.

batrider_flamebreak.name: Flamebreak
batrider_flamebreak.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.
batrider_flamebreak.lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.

batrider_firefly.name: Firefly
batrider_firefly.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. Batrider has bonus day/night vision while Firefly is active.
batrider_firefly.lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.

batrider_flaming_lasso.name: Flaming Lasso
batrider_flaming_lasso.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
batrider_flaming_lasso.lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.

chen_penitence.name: Penitence
chen_penitence.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.
chen_penitence.lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.

chen_holy_persuasion.name: Holy Persuasion
chen_holy_persuasion.description:
Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage. 

Can be cast on converted creeps to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.
chen_holy_persuasion.lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.

chen_divine_favor.name: Divine Favor
chen_divine_favor.description: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and armor.
chen_divine_favor.lore: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.

chen_hand_of_god.name: Hand of God
chen_hand_of_god.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for %hot_duration% afterwards.
chen_hand_of_god.lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.

special_bonus_unique_chen_12.description: Hand of God applies a Strong Dispel

special_bonus_unique_chen_2.description: +{s:bonus_heal_amount}/+{s:bonus_heal_per_second} Hand of God Heal/Heal Over Time

spectre_spectral_dagger.name: Spectral Dagger
spectre_spectral_dagger.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain. Spectral Dagger applies an instance of Desolate to targets with no allied units within 400 radius of them.
spectre_spectral_dagger.lore: Mercurial's dagger eclipses the physical plane in shadow, a state in which mortals cower, but spectres thrive.

spectre_desolate.name: Desolate
spectre_desolate.description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a %radius% radius around them.
spectre_desolate.lore: Often times, warriors find themselves alone with a vision of Mercurial - the fated question is if it is the true Spectre.

spectre_dispersion.name: Dispersion
spectre_dispersion.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
spectre_dispersion.lore: A daunting task lies before enemies of Mercurial - killing a shadow with blade and magic.

spectre_reality.name: Reality
spectre_reality.description: Spectre exchanges places with a chosen Haunt.
spectre_reality.lore: The scattered shadows unite into the one true Spectre.

spectre_haunt_single.name: Shadow Step
spectre_haunt_single.description: Allows Spectre to perform a single target unit Haunt. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.
spectre_haunt_single.lore: With great focus of will, Mercurial can sometimes limit the extent of her division.

spectre_haunt.name: Haunt
spectre_haunt.description:
Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They ignore terrain.
spectre_haunt.lore: At the height of combat, Mercurial's physical manifestation shatters, and the shadowy pieces haunt those who still cling to life.

doom_bringer_devour.name: Devour
doom_bringer_devour.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed and gaining armor temporarily while it digests the creep. If autocast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.
doom_bringer_devour.lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.

doom_bringer_scorched_earth.name: Scorched Earth
doom_bringer_scorched_earth.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.
doom_bringer_scorched_earth.lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.

doom_bringer_infernal_blade.name: Infernal Blade
doom_bringer_infernal_blade.description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for %ministun_duration% seconds and applies a %burn_duration% second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
doom_bringer_infernal_blade.lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.

doom_bringer_doom.name: Doom
doom_bringer_doom.description:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
doom_bringer_doom.lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.

ancient_apparition_cold_feet.name: Cold Feet
ancient_apparition_cold_feet.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
ancient_apparition_cold_feet.lore: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.

ancient_apparition_ice_vortex.name: Ice Vortex
ancient_apparition_ice_vortex.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.
ancient_apparition_ice_vortex.lore: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.

ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.name: Chilling Touch
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.description: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.
ancient_apparition_chilling_touch.lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his attacks.

ancient_apparition_ice_blast.name: Ice Blast
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.
ancient_apparition_ice_blast.lore: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.

ancient_apparition_ice_blast_release.name: Release
ancient_apparition_ice_blast_release.description: Releases the ice blast to explode at the tracer's current location.

ursa_earthshock.name: Earthshock
ursa_earthshock.description: Ursa leaps forward %hop_distance% units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for %abilityduration% seconds.
ursa_earthshock.lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.

ursa_overpower.name: Overpower
ursa_overpower.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.
ursa_overpower.lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.

ursa_fury_swipes.name: Fury Swipes
ursa_fury_swipes.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after %bonus_reset_time% seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
ursa_fury_swipes.lore: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.

ursa_enrage.name: Enrage
ursa_enrage.description:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
ursa_enrage.lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.

special_bonus_unique_ursa_enrage_radius.description: Enrage provides half benefits to allies in a {s:bonus_aoe_radius} radius

spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.name: Charge of Darkness
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.
spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness.lore: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.

spirit_breaker_bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
spirit_breaker_bulldoze.description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.
spirit_breaker_bulldoze.lore: Barathrum warps the fabric of reality around him, lessening its influence on his physical form.

spirit_breaker_greater_bash.name: Greater Bash
spirit_breaker_greater_bash.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage. Deals 1.5x damage to creeps.
spirit_breaker_greater_bash.lore: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.

spirit_breaker_planar_pocket.name: Planar Pocket
spirit_breaker_planar_pocket.description: Barathrum distorts the fabric of planar space, increasing his own magic resistance and redirecting the first targeted enemy hero spell in a radius towards him. Effect ends when the first spell is redirected.
spirit_breaker_planar_pocket.lore: Barathrum's unyielding focus forms a pocket of planar convergence from which not even the most powerful arcane energies can escape.

spirit_breaker_nether_strike.name: Nether Strike
spirit_breaker_nether_strike.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.
spirit_breaker_nether_strike.lore: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.

gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.name: Rocket Barrage
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds.
gyrocopter_rocket_barrage.lore: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.

gyrocopter_homing_missile.name: Homing Missile
gyrocopter_homing_missile.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.
gyrocopter_homing_missile.lore: The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb™ has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.

gyrocopter_flak_cannon.name: Flak Cannon
gyrocopter_flak_cannon.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts %abilityduration% seconds or until the attacks are used.
gyrocopter_flak_cannon.lore: This newly revamped Gyrocopter has attached enough armaments to assault in a 360 degree radius.

gyrocopter_call_down.name: Call Down
gyrocopter_call_down.description: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. After %missile_delay_tooltip% seconds, two missiles arrive in succession, with %missile_delay_tooltip% seconds between them.

alchemist_acid_spray.name: Acid Spray
alchemist_acid_spray.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.
alchemist_acid_spray.lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.

alchemist_unstable_concoction.name: Unstable Concoction
alchemist_unstable_concoction.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. Alchemist is faster while charging the concoction. After %brew_time% seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after %brew_explosion% seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
alchemist_unstable_concoction.lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.

alchemist_goblins_greed.name: Greevil's Greed
alchemist_goblins_greed.description: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next %duration% seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield more gold.
alchemist_goblins_greed.lore: While it is not a mountain, Razzil has mastered the conversion of smaller compounds to line his pockets.

alchemist_berserk_potion.name: Berserk Potion
alchemist_berserk_potion.description: Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

alchemist_chemical_rage.name: Chemical Rage
alchemist_chemical_rage.description:
Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
alchemist_chemical_rage.lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.

alchemist_unstable_concoction_throw.name: Unstable Concoction Throw
alchemist_unstable_concoction_throw.description: Throw it before it blows up!

special_bonus_unique_alchemist_3.description: Acid Spray grants armor to allies

invoker_quas.name: Quas
invoker_quas.description: Allows manipulation of ice elements. Passively grants +2 Strength per level. Each <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> instance provides increased health regeneration.

invoker_wex.name: Wex
invoker_wex.description: Allows manipulation of storm elements. Passively grants +2 Agility per level. Each <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.

invoker_exort.name: Exort
invoker_exort.description: Allows manipulation of fire elements. Passively grants +2 Intelligence per level. Each <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> instance provides increased attack damage.

invoker_invoke.name: Invoke
invoker_invoke.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by %cooldown_reduction_per_orb% seconds for each orb level.

Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.
invoker_invoke.lore: So begins a new age of knowledge.

invoker_cold_snap.name: Cold Snap
invoker_cold_snap.description: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>.

invoker_ghost_walk.name: Ghost Walk
invoker_ghost_walk.description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

invoker_tornado.name: Tornado
invoker_tornado.description:
Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

invoker_emp.name: E.M.P.
invoker_emp.description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after %delay% seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.  If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.

invoker_alacrity.name: Alacrity
invoker_alacrity.description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font> and their damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

invoker_chaos_meteor.name: Chaos Meteor
invoker_chaos_meteor.description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, and rolling further based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

invoker_sun_strike.name: Sun Strike
invoker_sun_strike.description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.

invoker_forge_spirit.name: Forge Spirit
invoker_forge_spirit.description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage and armor are based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font> while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. Spawns two spirits when Quas and Exort are at least level 4.

invoker_ice_wall.name: Ice Wall
invoker_ice_wall.description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font> and deals damage each second based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>.

invoker_deafening_blast.name: Deafening Blast
invoker_deafening_blast.description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of <font color='#cabe68'>Exort</font>. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of <font color='#7998b5'>Quas</font>, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of <font color='#d671a9'>Wex</font>.

silencer_curse_of_the_silent.name: Arcane Curse
silencer_curse_of_the_silent.description: Curses the target area, dealing damage and causing enemy heroes to take damage over time and slowing their movement speed. Silenced enemies take %penalty_multiplier%x slow and damage. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased. The cooldown is paused as long as the target is silenced.
silencer_curse_of_the_silent.lore: Nortrom's lack of incantations is less of a problem for him than it is for his adversaries.

silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.name: Glaives of Wisdom
silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. Silencer temporarily steals his target's Intelligence with each hit. If Silencer kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals %permanent_int_steal_amount% Intelligence.
silencer_glaives_of_wisdom.lore: Although lacking in traditional incantations, Nortrom's pedigree of the Aeol Drias gives him uncanny wisdom, which he applies to physical combat.

silencer_last_word.name: Last Word
silencer_last_word.description: Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.
silencer_last_word.lore: Nortrom ensures that spells uttered by his opponents will be their last.

silencer_global_silence.name: Global Silence
silencer_global_silence.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.
silencer_global_silence.lore: With a shock to the ground, all magic and sound pauses, and Nortrom fulfills his prophecy.

obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.name: Arcane Orb
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.
obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb.lore: Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.

obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.name: Astral Imprisonment
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.
obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment.lore: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.

obsidian_destroyer_equilibrium.name: Essence Flux
obsidian_destroyer_equilibrium.description: Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.
obsidian_destroyer_equilibrium.lore: The Outworld is awash in arcane energy, inclined to diffuse through any of Harbinger's rifts.

obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.name: Sanity's Eclipse
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.description: Unleashes a psychic blast that deals damage to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.
obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse.lore: When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.

lycan_summon_wolves.name: Summon Wolves
lycan_summon_wolves.description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Permanent Invisibility, and level 4 wolves have Cripple that gives 20% chance to cripple the target, causing 8 damage per second and lose 60 attack speed for 4 seconds.
lycan_summon_wolves.lore: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.

lycan_howl.name: Howl
lycan_howl.description: Strikes fear into enemies, reducing armor and attack damage to all enemies within %radius% range of Lycan and his wolves. At night Howl is global.
lycan_howl.lore: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.

lycan_feral_impulse.name: Feral Impulse
lycan_feral_impulse.description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.
lycan_feral_impulse.lore: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.

lycan_wolf_bite.name: Wolf Bite
lycan_wolf_bite.description: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain %lifesteal_percent%%% Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within %lifesteal_range% range of each other.

lycan_shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
lycan_shapeshift.description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal a critical strike doing %crit_multiplier%%% damage.
lycan_shapeshift.lore: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.

brewmaster_thunder_clap.name: Thunder Clap
brewmaster_thunder_clap.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.
brewmaster_thunder_clap.lore: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.

brewmaster_cinder_brew.name: Cinder Brew
brewmaster_cinder_brew.description: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by %extra_duration% seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger.
brewmaster_cinder_brew.lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

brewmaster_drunken_brawler.name: Drunken Brawler
brewmaster_drunken_brawler.description:
Brewmaster can switch stances based on the elements he controls gaining passive bonuses that improve against enemies when Brewed Up.
<font color="#9acd32">Earth Brawler</font> - Grants %armor% armor and %magic_resist%%% Magic Resistance. Bonuses are %active_multiplier%x when Brewed Up.
<font color="#87ceeb">Storm Brawler</font> - Grants %dodge_chance%%% evasion and %bonus_move_speed%%% Bonus Move Speed. Bonuses are %active_multiplier%x when Brewed Up.
<font color="#FF0000">Fire Brawler</font> - Grants %crit_chance%%% chance to crit for %crit_multiplier%%% of your attack damage. Chance is %active_multiplier%x when Brewed Up.
brewmaster_drunken_brawler.lore: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.

brewmaster_primal_companion.name: Primal Companion
brewmaster_primal_companion.description:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance. If the Brewling moves %disable_distance% range away from Brewmaster, it can no longer cast spells and is slowed by %movement_slow_when_out_of_range%%%. Otherwise, all of the Brewling spells have a %cooldown_penalty_pct%%% cooldown penalty.

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for %cooldown_on_take_damage%s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for %cooldown_on_death% seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.
brewmaster_primal_companion.lore: Mangix doesn't hold to it by rule, but he vaguely recalls an old master musing that, if one could manage, scaring up a companion was always preferable to drinking alone.

brewmaster_primal_split.name: Primal Split
brewmaster_primal_split.description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.
brewmaster_primal_split.lore: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.

special_bonus_unique_brewmaster_8.description: +{s:bonus_active_multiplier}x Brewed Up multiplier for Drunken Brawler

special_bonus_unique_brewmaster_4.description: Cinder Brew applies Fear when ignited

shadow_demon_disruption.name: Disruption
shadow_demon_disruption.description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.
shadow_demon_disruption.lore: The pain of deception comes not while it happens, but when it is revealed.

shadow_demon_disseminate.name: Disseminate
shadow_demon_disseminate.description: Whenever the target takes damage, all enemies, including the target itself if it is an enemy, within %radius% range of the target also receive a portion of that damage. Can target enemy and allied units. Effect is paused if the target is hidden by Disruption.

shadow_demon_shadow_poison.name: Shadow Poison
shadow_demon_shadow_poison.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to %max_multiply_stacks% stacks. Additional stacks cause %bonus_stack_damage% damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.
shadow_demon_shadow_poison.lore: The ever growing influence of the Shadow Demon can pollute the most valiant and pure of heroes.

shadow_demon_shadow_poison_release.name: Shadow Poison Release
shadow_demon_shadow_poison_release.description: Releases the poison to do damage on all affected enemies. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Shadow Poison.

shadow_demon_demonic_cleanse.name: Demonic Cleanse
shadow_demon_demonic_cleanse.description:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration.  At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

shadow_demon_demonic_purge.name: Demonic Purge
shadow_demon_demonic_purge.description:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
shadow_demon_demonic_purge.lore: Once Shadow Demon no longer has any need for his collected cultist, he releases it from its subservience - and its life.

lone_druid_spirit_bear.name: Summon Spirit Bear
lone_druid_spirit_bear.description:
Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers %backlash_damage%%% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.
Spirit Bear has the Return, Demolish and Entangling Claws abilities.
lone_druid_spirit_bear.lore: Sylla's lifelong companion is symbiotic with his spirit and heart, coming to aid him in any time of need.

lone_druid_spirit_link.name: Spirit Link
lone_druid_spirit_link.description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, sharing a percentage of their armor with each other, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.
lone_druid_spirit_link.lore: Sylla is emboldened by the presence of his companion, his vitality replenished with each swipe of the Spirit Bear's claws.

lone_druid_savage_roar.name: Savage Roar
lone_druid_savage_roar.description: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by %bonus_speed%%%.
lone_druid_savage_roar.lore: Sylla studies and masters the arts of the lost Bear Clan, enhancing his attunement with the wild.

lone_druid_true_form.name: True Form
lone_druid_true_form.description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage, but gaining increased bonus armor and health, and improved versions of Entangling Claws and Demolish.
lone_druid_true_form.lore: The mighty bear is the king of the forest, possessing the throne through raw power.

special_bonus_unique_lone_druid_7.description: +1000 True Form and Spirit Bear Health

chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.name: Chaos Bolt
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
chaos_knight_chaos_bolt.lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.

chaos_knight_reality_rift.name: Reality Rift
chaos_knight_reality_rift.description: Teleports Chaos Knight, any illusions he has, and the target unit to a point along the line between him and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for %duration% seconds.
chaos_knight_reality_rift.lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.

chaos_knight_chaos_strike.name: Chaos Strike
chaos_knight_chaos_strike.description: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength, in addition to a lifesteal for percentage of the damage. Deals %creep_multiplier%x damage to creeps.
chaos_knight_chaos_strike.lore: Chaos Knight's unwieldy power bludgeons those who stand before him, crushing the thickest of armors.

chaos_knight_phantasm.name: Phantasm
chaos_knight_phantasm.description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal %outgoing_damage_tooltip%%% damage, but take %incoming_damage_tooltip%%% damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
chaos_knight_phantasm.lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.

meepo_earthbind.name: Earthbind
meepo_earthbind.description: Tosses a net at the target point, rooting down all enemy units in an area around it.
meepo_earthbind.lore: Catching dinner in the Riftshadow Ruins can be quite the task.

meepo_poof.name: Poof
meepo_poof.description: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for %abilitycastpoint% seconds, damaging the enemy in both the departure and arrival locations.
meepo_poof.lore: Sometimes breaking one of the Riftshadow Crystals can be just the trick for getting yourself out of a bind.  Or your other self.

meepo_ransack.name: Ransack
meepo_ransack.description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
meepo_ransack.lore: So you gonna need that, or...?

meepo_petrify.name: Dig
meepo_petrify.description: Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for %duration%s. Restores %hp_restore%%% of his max health over that duration. Can’t be cast while rooted.

meepo_divided_we_stand.name: Divided We Stand
meepo_divided_we_stand.description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Divided We Stand grants all Meepos bonus Magic Resistance.

special_bonus_unique_meepo_4.description: Earthbind grants True Strike on Targets

treant_natures_grasp.name: Nature's Grasp
treant_natures_grasp.description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.
treant_natures_grasp.lore: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.

treant_leech_seed.name: Leech Seed
treant_leech_seed.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.
treant_leech_seed.lore: Rooftrellen nurtures the beings under his stewardship, sustained by the lifeforce of trespassers into his sacred ground.

treant_living_armor.name: Living Armor
treant_living_armor.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.
treant_living_armor.lore: The roots and tendrils of the Treant Protectors are far-reaching, stimulating the growth and rejuvenation of all of nature.

treant_eyes_in_the_forest.name: Eyes In The Forest
treant_eyes_in_the_forest.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.
treant_eyes_in_the_forest.lore: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.

treant_natures_guise.name: Nature's Guise
treant_natures_guise.description: Provides Treant with Tree Walking whenever he hasn't taken damage for %cooldown_time% seconds. While active, Treant gains movement speed bonus and amplified healing and regeneration on himself.
treant_natures_guise.lore: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.

treant_overgrowth.name: Overgrowth
treant_overgrowth.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
treant_overgrowth.lore: Rooftrellen calls the ancestral spirit of nature, releasing its power through all of his kin.

ogre_magi_fireblast.name: Fireblast
ogre_magi_fireblast.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
ogre_magi_fireblast.lore: The Ogre Magi is easily amused, entertained for hours by playing with fire.

ogre_magi_ignite.name: Ignite
ogre_magi_ignite.description: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

ogre_magi_bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
ogre_magi_bloodlust.description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.
ogre_magi_bloodlust.lore: 'Running's not as fun as hitting... Not one bit fun.'

ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast.name: Unrefined Fireblast
ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is %scepter_mana%%% of Ogre Magi's current mana.
ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast.lore: The 'who-casts-spell-first' argument between himself is solved simply by both casting at once.

ogre_magi_smash.name: Fire Shield
ogre_magi_smash.description: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next %attacks% attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker.

ogre_magi_multicast.name: Multicast
ogre_magi_multicast.description: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.
ogre_magi_multicast.lore: Despite being largely incapacitated by his IQ, the Ogre Magi's success in battle is attributed to pure skill.

undying_decay.name: Decay
undying_decay.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Deals %creep_damage_multiplier%x damage to creeps.
undying_decay.lore: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.

undying_soul_rip.name: Soul Rip
undying_soul_rip.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
undying_soul_rip.lore: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.

undying_tombstone.name: Tombstone
undying_tombstone.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
undying_tombstone.lore: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.

undying_flesh_golem.name: Flesh Golem
undying_flesh_golem.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.
undying_flesh_golem.lore: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.

rubick_telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
rubick_telekinesis.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.
rubick_telekinesis.lore: Even the Grandest Magus may use his powers for enjoyment.

rubick_fade_bolt.name: Fade Bolt
rubick_fade_bolt.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.
rubick_fade_bolt.lore: Rubick's favorite spell for dispatching would-be assassins is a rather simple conjuration.

rubick_arcane_supremacy.name: Arcane Supremacy
rubick_arcane_supremacy.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.
rubick_arcane_supremacy.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...

rubick_spell_steal.name: Spell Steal
rubick_spell_steal.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies, and stolen spells last longer on enemies.
rubick_spell_steal.lore: ...but even their lesser magics can be a source of much utility.

rubick_telekinesis_land.name: Telekinesis Land
rubick_telekinesis_land.description: Chooses the location the target will land when Telekinesis finishes.

rubick_telekinesis_land_self.name: Telekinesis Land
rubick_telekinesis_land_self.description: Chooses the location you will land when Telekinesis finishes.

disruptor_thunder_strike.name: Thunder Strike
disruptor_thunder_strike.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by %slow_amount%%% for %slow_duration% seconds.  Provides vision of its target.
disruptor_thunder_strike.lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.

disruptor_glimpse.name: Glimpse
disruptor_glimpse.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions. Deals damage based on distance glimpsed, with max damage dealt at %max_distance% distance.
disruptor_glimpse.lore: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.

disruptor_kinetic_field.name: Kinetic Field
disruptor_kinetic_field.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
disruptor_kinetic_field.lore: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.

disruptor_static_storm.name: Static Storm
disruptor_static_storm.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.
disruptor_static_storm.lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.

nyx_assassin_impale.name: Impale
nyx_assassin_impale.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
nyx_assassin_impale.lore: All zealot scarabs possess intimate knowledge of underground pathways, using them to their advantage.

nyx_assassin_mana_burn.name: Mana Burn
nyx_assassin_mana_burn.description: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.
nyx_assassin_mana_burn.lore: The tome in Ultimyr describes one scarab with the ability eat away at the mind of lesser beings.

nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.name: Spiked Carapace
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.description:
When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.
nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.lore: While their carapace is relatively thin, it's guarded by a retractable field of razor-sharp spikes.

nyx_assassin_burrow.name: Burrow
nyx_assassin_burrow.description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
nyx_assassin_burrow.lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

nyx_assassin_vendetta.name: Vendetta
nyx_assassin_vendetta.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.
nyx_assassin_vendetta.lore: The scarab kills for the glory of his queen.

nyx_assassin_unburrow.name: Unburrow
nyx_assassin_unburrow.lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

naga_siren_mirror_image.name: Mirror Image
naga_siren_mirror_image.description:
Creates multiple images of Naga Siren under her control.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
naga_siren_mirror_image.lore: Slithice, while being strong in her own right, is notoriously hard to track down.

naga_siren_ensnare.name: Ensnare
naga_siren_ensnare.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
naga_siren_ensnare.lore: The only way to escape the onslaught of a Slithereen is to never oppose one in the first place.

naga_siren_rip_tide.name: Rip Tide
naga_siren_rip_tide.description: Every %hits% attack from naga and her illusions, the Naga Siren and her images will hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for %duration% seconds.
naga_siren_rip_tide.lore: A torrent from the Deep Ones crushes the defenses of the Siren's enemies.

naga_siren_reel_in.name: Reel In
naga_siren_reel_in.description: CHANNELED - Naga Siren channels for up to %AbilityChannelTime% seconds, pulling all units affected by Naga's Ensnare in a %radius% range towards her at a speed of %pull_strength%.
naga_siren_reel_in.lore: Even the youngest Slithereen are well schooled in trawling for prey with nothing but their wits and nets.

naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.name: Song of the Siren
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren.lore: Slithice's powerful voice enchants leagues of opponents, while calling her Slithereen kin in a time of need.

naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_cancel.name: Song of the Siren End
naga_siren_song_of_the_siren_cancel.description: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.

keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.name: Illuminate
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.
keeper_of_the_light_illuminate.lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.

keeper_of_the_light_radiant_bind.name: Solar Bind
keeper_of_the_light_radiant_bind.description: Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.

keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic.name: Chakra Magic
keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic.description: Restores mana to the target unit and reduces cooldowns of all abilities currently on cooldown by a fixed amount.
keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic.lore: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.

keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light.name: Blinding Light
keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light.description: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss some attacks. Knockback is %knockback_distance% range over %knockback_duration% seconds.
